title: Generate Permutations
algorithmDescription: Generate all permutations of array using backtracking algorithm
detailedDescription: Generate all permutations of given array using backtracking. Input: First line has n, second line has n distinct integers. Output: All permutations, one per line. Use recursive backtracking: try each element at each position, recursively generate rest, backtrack.
hints: Use recursion with current permutation state
Try placing each unused element at current position
When permutation complete (length = n), add to results
Backtrack by removing element and trying next
solutionApproach: Recursive backtracking: if current permutation length equals n, add to results. Otherwise, try each unused element: mark as used, add to permutation, recurse, then backtrack (remove element, mark unused).
testCaseCriteria: Must generate all n! permutations. No duplicates. Should use backtracking approach.
